channel.title: Ralph on CamMakoJ
channel.description: Recent content in Ralph on CamMakoJ

item.title: Ralphy Boy
item.description: Our little dude Ralph is pretty awesome. We have been working pretty hard to get him trained up… so hopefully one day he can come fishing with me. So far he has been with me for some short fishing sessions of an hour or so, but never longer… he starts to get bored, and he isn’t at the place I can totally trust him off leash just yet. He also hasn’t been a huge fan of the water.
